messages.title: Only a Majority Government Can Get on With the Country’s Priorities
messages.content: At the end of this election, we’ll either get a Conservative majority – or a hung parliament. A vote for Labour means another hung parliament. SNP to back Labour government only with Scottish independence vote.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Conservative government has committed £400m to build a brand new hospital.
Stop Labour taking away 15 minutes free parking in Waltham Forest. Fight for 30 minutes free parking to help local businesses.
Campaign for CCTV on the Central Line and more trains on the Central Line to ease overcrowding.
More Police coming to Chingford & Woodford Green to help make streets safer.
OPPOSE high-rise, high density development in Chingford, Highams Park, Woodford Green & South Woodford and the waste incinerator at Edmonton.
Stand up for pensioners, the low paid, shift workers and small businesses, against Labour's £12.50 daily tax on driving.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A vote for Labour means another hung parliament.

issues.education: English schools to get three-year £14bn funding boost.
issues.health: Government plans billions for hospital projects. The Conservative government has committed £400m to build a brand new hospital.
issues.labourEmployment: Stand up for pensioners, the low paid, shift workers and small businesses against Labour's £12.50 daily tax on driving.
issues.lawCrime: End of the soft prison sentence. Campaign for CCTV on the Central Line and more trains on the Central Line to ease overcrowding.
issues.transport: Campaign for CCTV on the Central Line and more trains on the Central Line to ease overcrowding.
